items.summary: Create a Progressive Web App (PWA) manifest.json file in the frontend/public directory with appropriate app metadata including app name 'Vitals AI', short_name, description, theme_color using the teal color scheme (#14b8a6), background_color, display mode set to 'standalone', and icons array with appropriate sizes for mobile installation
Update frontend/index.html to include a link tag referencing the manifest.json file in the <head> section to enable PWA installation prompts on mobile devices

Create a QRCodeGenerator component in frontend/src/components that generates a QR code pointing to the URL 'https://vitals-ai-featuringsmarthospitals-jrg.caffeine.xyz/#caffeineAdminToken=caf86f15a219649b9883aca3e42d0418f6e4682726fd4227e005e7f46af65497' with both display and download functionality, styled consistently with the Flipkart-inspired teal design aesthetic

Integrate the QRCodeGenerator component into the AdminDashboard component (frontend/src/components/AdminDashboard.tsx) by adding it as a new section or card within the admin interface, positioned prominently for easy access
